name: Vileplume GX
author: Kagemaru Himeno

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Massive Bloom
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 less damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Allergic Explosion GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned, Paralyzed, and Poisoned. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
